description:
Flyers are one of the major marketing material used these days to promote any kind of business. This Course is a complete guide to making print-ready Corporate Flyers in Photoshop. Throughout this course, you will learn multiple tools and techniques that saves a lot of your time.

This course is targeted for audience of all levels, as the more complicated steps are also explained very clearly. This course will enrich your current design skills and help you to make your designs better. Links to the Photos and logo used in this course will be provided along with the psd file.

A very basic knowledge is needed, although every detail will be explained step-by-step.
title: Making Corporate Flyers in Photoshop
